title: Adwokat Kowalska
description: This is a one-page website for a law firm, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript based on provided guidelines. Hosted and deployed on OVH Cloud. It includes static information about the firm, a map, and contact details.

title: Panaceum Net
description: A Single Page Application (SPA) ready for hosting, currently awaiting the right moment for deployment. Built with pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, with data fetched from a JSON file stored on GitHub. Developed according to specifications and will be further enhanced; it's my project and implementation.

title: Futurum Kurs
description: A website I refactored, adding features like responsive web design (RWD) and mobile device compatibility. Updated according to client requirements, it includes a newsletter subscription and a contact form, along with animations.

title: Futurum Tech
description: Made several improvements, including adding multi-language support, enhancing responsive web design (RWD), implementing a trial sign-up feature, and fixing various bugs and conversion issues.
